DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare posterior dynamic stabilization fusion treatment lumbar degenerative disease .
DOC.detailed_description: Two strategy treatment degenerative lumbar instability frequent clinical use : fusion versus dynamic stabilization . Up clear whether fusion ( Gold-standard ) non-fusion technique superior . Nevertheless data available dynamic stabilization less invasive technique achieve similar good result concern patient satisfaction re-OP rate compare fusion standard therapy .
